title: Best of The Herd for Aug 27, 2020

description:
-The NBA made the right decision to keep their TV platform

-NBA Players have always been willing to sacrifice money for different things

-LeBron's impact is always more than just basketball

-2020 is not the year for rigid people


Guests: BJ Armstrong, Agent & 3x NBA Champion

Tristan Thompson, Cavs C & NBA Champion
